issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://screenrant.com/star-wars-ahsoka-season-2-abeloth-art/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fscreenrant.com%2Fstar-wars-ahsoka-season-2-abeloth-art%2F) ### Comment > accessing stories posted on screenrant.com, cbr.com, (and others with similar formatting) results in an impassable pop-up. Occurs on mobile and desktop browsers ### Screenshots

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://screenrant.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fscreenrant.com) ### Comment > The safari filters on iOS work fine for getting around this but in the google app using the AdGuard DNS server the site detects ad blocking. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/k1cheosn6ggs00wkgg0kssgwwkgwsoo2hu2kjdo8t6.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/87dti53fqvwggsk04csc08os888koccm7rv03sokjk.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/491bsklvaiwwc4gc8c4ww4sk44w4ws8pem7q65tf4s.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.0 System version: | AdGuard DNS DNS filtering: | server: `Adguard`, `DNS`
filters: `AdGuard DNS` Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base Other extensions used: | On iOS using AdGuard DNS

comment.body:
New domain:
`yugenmangas.org##.ad-container`

I guess that these rules `###teaser3` are now unrequired, unfortunaly non adguard base users will not have this fixed.

Also, and sorry if it's to unrelated, the Disqus iframe on the bottom of this site `randomscanlators.net/manga/a-espada-do-imperador5)` is removed after 4 seconds, due to this script: 
`https://randomscanlators.net/wp-content/plugins/Remove%20Ads%20Disqus/assets/js/frontend.js`

Fix:
`randomscanlators.net##+js(no-setTimeout-if, removead)`

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://www.youtube.com/@tunetankmusic/about](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F%40tunetankmusic%2Fabout) ### Comment > I used AdGuard on Chromium, Brave, and Firefox. While AdGuard is active I can not unsubscribe from any video on YouTube on any browser. Disabling and trying the page again fails. If I disable AdGuard, close the browsers, then restart, the unsubscribe button is visible again. I did update filters. ### Screenshots

Self-destructing third-party cookies (2880),
Hide your Referrer from third-parties Filters: | Ad Blocking:

comment.body:
@umin Please update filters and reload the website.
If it does not work, please follow the following process:
 - Clear site data, cookies and cache of your web browser.
 - Delete TouchEn and BlockTube web browser extension.
 - Close your web browser entirely and re-open it.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://www.youtube.com/@tunetankmusic/about](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F%40tunetankmusic%2Fabout) ### Comment > I used AdGuard on Chromium, Brave, and Firefox. While AdGuard is active I can not unsubscribe from any video on YouTube on any browser. Disabling and trying the page again fails. If I disable AdGuard, close the browsers, then restart, the unsubscribe button is visible again. I did update filters. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/cq7zhgkoi08o4skkkgwcg8ggock0socbliaty4vxnk.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.2.168 Browser: | Chrome Stealth mode options: | Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Self-destructing third-party cookies (2880),
Hide your Referrer from third-parties Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social Widgets:

Security:

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/162262#issuecomment-1760660966
Please remove AdBlock Plus and update filters of AdGuard Browser Extension.
